name: Project Reaper
description:
Use fear to dispatch your enemies in order to collect Death's lost limbs in this fast-paced 2D action-platformer. Reap the souls of terrifying enemies as they desperately cling to their immortality.

Control Scheme:

-Moving: WASD or Arrows on keyboard.

-Jumping: Space bar.

-Dash: Left Shift.

-Attack: Mouse left click.

Execute: Mouse right click.
